document_data.name: Ye Olde Bluff Jeweler
document_data.mainbody: '''Ye Olde Bluff Jeweler''' was a jewelry shop in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] during the mid-1300s [[DR]], run by the extremely skilled [[Shorlock Revahl]], who performed his craft with absolute enthusiasm and alacrity.
document_data.Location: This store was located along [[MacIntyre Path]], in the [[Swordspoint]] neighborhood of Ravens Bluff.

Structure.Interior: The interior was just as impressive as the exterior, with a stunning showroom that featured Revahl's fine pieces, as if they were works of art. The second story served as home to the old jeweler, featuring his personal collection of sculptures and paintings. Among these were an original from the renowned [[Ambrose Pistlewaite]].

document_data.Services: All sorts of [[gem]]-ornamented accessories were sold at this store. From [[ring]]s, [[brooch]]es and [[tiara]]s, predominantly crafted from [[gold]], to [[bracer]]s or [[amulet]]s that would later be [[enchanted]] by [[arcane]] [[wizard]]s.
